scripts.test: mocha --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options "code=false,reportTitle=IBM Watson Conversation Sample"  --exit spec
scripts.emulator: npm install botium-cli && botium-cli emulator console --convos ./spec/convo --config ./testmybot.json
scripts.emulatorBrowser: npm install botium-cli && botium-cli emulator browser --convos ./spec/convo --config ./testmybot.json
